channel.title: Macrowarn help
channel.description: Hi i have a command called macrowarn and it is like banuser only it says when u log in you have 1 black mark etc and theres a file in data like in banusers i want it to auto ban when the player has 2 blackmarks and also when the player logs in if they have 2 blackmark it says they have 1 thanks

item.title: Macrowarn help
item.dc:creator: @Mag_For_Lif2 Mag For Lif2
item.description:
@Mag_For_Lif2 wrote:

thx what about the auto ban?

Read full topic

item.title: Macrowarn help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make a method check the integer for blackmarks upon logging into the server.

In a 317, in the method that is used when a player logs in, such as initialize(), you can do something to check it like this:

if (blackMarks == 2) { appendToBanned(playerName); }

This is just a very crappy base for a simple method, but hopefully you can base the rest off of that.

Read full topic
